mapper.select: SELECT T01.SEQ , T02.CODE_DTL_NM AS GUBUN , T01.CONTENT , T01.REG_ID AS REGID , DATE_FORMAT(T01.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d : %H:%i') AS REGDATE FROM chloveon.TEMP_BOARD AS T01 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CODE_DTL_CD , CODE_DTL_NM FROM chloveon.CODE_DTL WHERE 1=1 AND CODE_CD = 'MST03' ) AS T02 ON T01.GUBUN = T02.CODE_DTL_CD WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY T01.REG_DATE DESC
